meanings.definition: The combination of qualities or features that form a person's character.
meanings.sent1: Her makeups of kindness and honesty make her a great friend.
meanings.sent2: His makeups of determination and creativity helped him succeed.
meanings.sent3: His makeups of clumsiness and forgetfulness always lead to funny situations.
meanings.sent4: The makeups of a good leader include empathy and decisiveness.
meanings.sent5: The makeups of a good story involve suspense and relatable characters.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is put together or arranged.
meanings.sent1: The makeups of the puzzle were challenging to figure out.
meanings.sent2: The makeups of the room were elegant and well-coordinated.
meanings.sent3: The makeups of the traffic flow seemed chaotic but somehow worked.
meanings.sent4: The makeups of the recipe were simple yet delicious.
meanings.sent5: The makeups of the plan were detailed and organized.

meanings.definition: The act or process of creating something.
meanings.sent1: The makeups of a painting require patience and skill.
meanings.sent2: The makeups of a song involve lyrics and melody.
meanings.sent3: The makeups of a sculpture can be messy but rewarding.
meanings.sent4: The makeups of a plan include brainstorming and execution.
meanings.sent5: The makeups of a project determine its success or failure.

meanings.definition: Cosmetics applied to the face to enhance or alter appearance.
meanings.sent1: She used makeups to create a glamorous look for the party.
meanings.sent2: Makeups can enhance natural beauty when applied subtly.
meanings.sent3: His makeups for Halloween were so realistic, they scared everyone.
meanings.sent4: The makeups she wore on stage transformed her into a different character.
meanings.sent5: The makeups used in theater need to be bold to be seen from a distance.
